Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the overseer of scribes of the tribunal Tjahepimu with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard, crossed hands in relief(damaged) holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the waist is inscribed with a row of incised Hieroglyphs, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a similar column; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
